pages.title: Final Fractal
pages.text: $(li)The Final Fractal, forged with a $(l:patchouli:weapons/netherite_sword)Netherite Sword$(/l) and a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/cataclysm/witherite_ingot)Witherite Ingot$(/l) is the second strongest sword.$(br)$(li)It is even more powerful and durable than a common $(br)$(l:patchouli:weapons/end_crystal_sword)End Crystal Sword$(/l).
